entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 04:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: NNW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
